snippet: Hundreds of pages of secret church files were released on Wednesday, shedding light on the careers of a dozen clergy members accused of sexually abusing children.
abstract: Hundreds of pages of secret church files are released under terms of 2007 settlement agreement, shedding light on careers of dozen religious figures accused of sexually abusing children while working in the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Los Angeles.
lead_paragraph: Hundreds of pages of secret church files were released on Wednesday, shedding light on the careers of a dozen clergy members accused of sexually abusing children.

headline.main: California: Religious Orders Release More Files on Sexual Abuse
headline.print_headline: California: Los Angeles Archdiocese Releases More Files On Sexual Abuse
